description: Update documentation to reflect the new terminal monitor features.
instructions: Locate the section related to logging and monitoring.
Add a new subsection or update the existing one to describe the terminal monitor feature.
Explain how users can enable the terminal monitor, likely through a command-line option or configuration setting.
Describe the segmented layout of the terminal monitor, detailing what information is displayed in each segment (e.g., AI calls, tool usage, task progress).
Explain the purpose and benefit of the ASCII outlines used to visually separate the segments.
Describe the output suppression feature and how it helps manage verbose output.
Explain the coloring features used in the monitor to highlight different types of information or status.
Provide clear examples or screenshots if possible (though generating screenshots is out of scope for this subtask, mention where they might be found or linked).
Locate the section introducing the AIWhisperer tool and its features.
Add a brief mention of the terminal monitor as a new feature for observing execution progress.
Include a reference to the more detailed documentation in `docs/logging_monitoring.md` for users who want to learn more about the monitor.
Ensure the language is clear, concise, and easy for users to understand.
Review both updated files (`docs/logging_monitoring.md` and `README.md`) for accuracy and completeness regarding the terminal monitor feature.
constraints: Updates must be made only to the specified documentation files.
The documentation must accurately reflect the functionality of the terminal monitor as implemented.
Avoid making unnecessary changes to other parts of the documentation.
Maintain the existing formatting style of the documentation files.
validation_criteria: The files `docs/logging_monitoring.md` and `README.md` have been modified.
`docs/logging_monitoring.md` contains a description of the terminal monitor.
`docs/logging_monitoring.md` explains how to enable the monitor.
`docs/logging_monitoring.md` describes the segmented layout, ASCII outlines, output suppression, and coloring.
`README.md` refers users to `docs/logging_monitoring.md` for more details.
The documentation is easy to understand and accurately reflects the implemented features.
name: update_documentation
